cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project(MyProject)

# Specify the C++ standard if needed
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

# Find the GMP package generated by Conan's CMakeDeps generator
find_package(gmp CONFIG REQUIRED)

# Add the executable target
add_executable(my_executable main.cpp)

# Link the GMP library to your executable
target_link_libraries(my_executable PRIVATE gmp::gmp)
